name: Founding The M.T.L.
description:
Year is 3037 A.D.  and  Humanity is coming to an end... 

Sooner or later the Museum of Terrestrial Life will be the only proof, for future intelligent lifeforms, of Humanity's once great existence. 

But it isn't finished yet.  And although it needs to be, it won't be an easy task!

Take control of robot DK66, and guide him through the chaotic digital memories of his master, Enkydoo, the last man alive. 

Explore the remains of a bygone civilisation, find a way out of each memory cell, understand their logic, and be aware of the dangers that could destroy DK66.  

Moreover, DK66 needs power... a robot low on battery runs slower and slower, cannot jump anymore, and if too low, it explodes!

If you're good enough, Humanity won't fall in oblivion.
